A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Marxist is amazing. The part where they tell you to burn all the Marxist text and have no heroes\, symbols\, or ideology but also to use the ideas and to remain a force for good\, though business will attempt to co-opt the word itself really was good shit.\n\nThe part where they tell you to burn all the Marxist text and have no heroes\, symbols\, or ideology but also to use the ideas and to remain a force for good\, though business will attempt to co-opt the word itself really was good. Similarly\, I particularly enjoyed when both social myth and cultivated identity were purged for the sake of fighting evil uncorrupted. Everything reviews called \"purposeless\" in the film was actually just there to tear down capitalism and all the abuse that enables it.
